backend/main.mo: Defines access-controlled actor handling contact form submissions and user profile CRUD with admin and user permission checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables including light/dark color palettes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file with branding, meta tags, and script entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for main pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: React Hook Form-based contact form with validation, topic selection, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer layout showing branding, quick links, contact text, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with branding, desktop nav, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: Intersection Observer animation wrapper that reveals content on scroll with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders a clickable service card with icon, title, description, and keyboard accessibility.
Displays a modal panel with detailed service info including features, applications, and a contact button.
Provides search and category filter controls for services using an input and select dropdown.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding assets including logos, icons, and company metadata.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Exports the Service type and a list of service definitions with descriptions, features, applications, and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook for submitting contact forms via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Tracks the user’s reduced-motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Updates document and social metadata tags based on provided title and description.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, dark mode, accessibility styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, company overview, and a list of automation capabilities using animated scroll reveals.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, SEO metadata, and a contact form with scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, service previews, and calls-to-action, using SEO setup and scroll reveal effects.
frontend/src/pages/SolutionsPage.tsx: Provides a filterable list of automation services with search, category filtering, and a detail panel, along with SEO setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the scaffolded Internet Computer app, including frontend/back-end architecture notes, generated assets, existing feature inventory, and known logo-related issues. It serves as a project state snapshot for build and fix planning.
